title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server that lets you pull, create, and run Llama-2, CodeLlama, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for chatting, embedding, pulling and managing Ollama models with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama (PyPI)
summary: LangChain adapter giving Ollama models first-class support for LLM, chat, embeddings and tool-calling.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich local ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG and admin panel.

title: ollama4j – Java SDK
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming, and model management utilities.

title: ollama-rails – Ruby gem
summary: Ruby wrapper that adds ActiveModel-style interface for chatting and embedding inside Rails apps.

title: ollama-copilot.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin that turns Ollama models into a GitHub-Copilot inline-completion engine.

title: ollama-chat-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin to chat with local Ollama models inside your vault and summarize notes.

title: ollama-workflows – n8n nodes
summary: Community n8n node pack exposing chat, embed, pull and list operations for no-code Ollama workflows.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Docker-Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, Weaviate vector DB and Nginx for turnkey local RAG.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated registry of custom Modelfiles (Llama-3, Phi-3, SQLCoder, etc.) with build badges.

title: ollama-cli – Rust client
summary: Fast CLI written in Rust that wraps the Ollama REST API with shell completions and progress bars.

title: ollama-csharp – .NET SDK
summary: Community-maintained C# client targeting .NET 6+ with async enumerable streaming and DI helpers.

title: ollama-dagger – CI module
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama service containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-rag-langchain tutorial
summary: Step-by-step repo showing how to build a PDF question-answering bot with Ollama + LangChain + Chroma.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Lightweight Discord.py bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-rust – High-level SDK
summary: Idiomatic Rust crate providing typed structs, SSE streaming, and optional Tokio runtime.

title: ollama-model-converter
summary: Utility scripts to convert HuggingFace transformers models into Ollama Modelfiles with GGUF quantization.
